newsitem.title: USA: Coda Music Technology Q3 revenues down.
newsitem.headline: Coda Music Technology Q3 revenues down.

text.p: Coda Music Technology Inc said Wednesday its third quarter revenues were about $1.2 million, down from $1.4 million a year ago.
For the year through the third quarter, revenues were about $3.7 million, compared to $3.6 million reported a year ago, the music software and technology company said.

As previously announced, the company said it does not expect to release any upgrades to its Finale music notation software until the fourth quarter of this year. In the third quarter of 1995, new upgrade revenues totaled about $250,000, the company said.
The company said it expects to release full results for the third quarter on November 6.
